DocWhereRule.Name: MinutesInRange
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The second measure (minutes) shall be between -60 exclusive and 60 exclusive.

DocWhereRule.Name: SecondsInRange
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The third measure (seconds) shall be between -60 exclusive and 60 exclusive.

DocWhereRule.Name: MicrosecondsInRange
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The forth measure (millionth-seconds), if asserted, shall be between -1e6 exclusive and 1e6 exclusive.

DocWhereRule.Name: ConsistentSign
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All non-zero measure components shall have the same sign (positive or negative).
DocWhereRule.Expression: ((SELF[1] >= 0) AND (SELF[2] >= 0) AND (SELF[3] >= 0) AND ((SIZEOF(SELF) = 3) OR (SELF[4] >= 0))) OR ((SELF[1] <= 0) AND (SELF[2] <= 0) AND (SELF[3] <= 0) AND ((SIZEOF(SELF) = 3) OR (SELF[4] <= 0)))
